channel.title: "Size of files is not what the server reported"
channel.description:
After performing a dist-upgrade, both workstation and gateway came up with the following errors,
W: Size of file /var/cache/apt/archives/partial/anon-ws-disable-stacked-tor_3%3a2.4-1_all.deb is not what the server reported 22468 154
W: Size of file /var/cache/apt/archives/partial/tb-updater_3%3a3.7.10-1_all.deb is not what the server reported 153338 16008
W: Size of file /var/cache/apt/archives/partial/whonix-repository_3%3a2.2.2-1_all.deb is not what the server reported 47782 16010
Is this something to worry about? The upgrade was performed on 31 dec. Is there anyway to fix this?

item.title: "Size of files is not what the server reported"
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Please use the search function first. When you type for example size of file is not into the Whonix forum search or site:whonix.org Size of file is not what the server reported or similar into a search engine you find this has already been discussed and solved.

https://forums.whonix.org/t/size-of-file-dists-jessie-main-binary-amd64-packages-gz-is-not-what-the-server-reported

Read full topic
item.source: "Size of files is not what the server reported"
